name: ROBO Scrub INC.
description:
It's spring cleaning season and your the new robot in the ROBO Scrub AI line. You must clean up clients houses while dealing with some of your own technical problems. 

Submitted for the 2022 New Media Game Jam

Theme: Spring Cleaning

Note: I enjoyed making this game. I feel like having to deal with a robot that has some problems of its own while cleaning makes it challenge. Feel free to donate to the project this helps us out on other and current projects , If you wanna help other ways then just recommend it to friends :) Have a great day - Ezra/N0thingsleft
